reviews.text: I'm convinced this is the best bar in Columbus. Great chill, local, vibe. Amazing staff. The sort of place you feel welcome and want to visit again. Highly...

When I was younger, so much younger than today...I went here and it was called the Black Forest Inn.

One of the stalwart bar venues near Ohio State...

Ahhhhhh..... The Scholar. You have my heart.

This little dive is conveniently located near Tommy's Pizza on the corner of Lane and Neil. Despite its prime...
